message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.
I'm interested in the product, but $110 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $90 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $100. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.
I'm still not convinced that $100 is a good deal. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
